prompt.clinicalNote:
Summary:
Patient presents with irregular menstrual cycles, severe cramps, menorrhagia, and fertility concerns related to unsuccessful attempts at conception despite tracking ovulation.

Body:
Patient reports heavier flow, increased fatigue, and unsuccessful use of ovulation predictor kits.
Concerns about fertility and ovulatory dysfunction raised.
Plan:
Order tests to investigate menorrhagia, hormone levels, and ovarian function.
Develop a personalized plan to address fertility concerns and provide support.
guidelines: GTG 2012 - Initial Mx of Chronic Pelvic Pain - PDF | Algo | Apply
prompt.prompt: Please review the following clinical note and suggest improvements. Use the following guidelines: GTG 2012 - Initial Mx of Chronic Pelvic Pain - PDF | Algo | Apply. Return the note with suggested changes in italics.
